charges.charge_description: 21:846, 841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(C) CONSPIRACY TO MANUFACTURE CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE - Schedule II Methamphetamine(1)

charges.charge_disposition: 109 months imprisonment consisting of an 85 month term imposed on Count 1 and a 24 month term imposed on Count 2 of the Indictment, to be served consecutively. 3 years supervised release consisting of a 3 year term imposed on each of Counts 1 and 2 of the Indictment, to be served concurrently. 200.00 assessment.

charges.charge_description: 21:846, 860(a), 841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(C) CONSPIRACY TO MANUFACTURE CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE - Schedule II Methamphetamine(2)

charges.charge_disposition: 109 months imprisonment consisting of an 85 month term imposed on Count 1 and a 24 month term imposed on Count 2 of the Indictment, to be served consecutively. 3 years supervised release consisting of a 3 year term imposed on each of Counts 1 and 2 of the Indictment, to be served concurrently. 200.00 assessment.
